name: Cascader
description:
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the theme "out of control." I wanted explosive chaos and got somewhat close.

Controls

- WASD or arrow keys to move

- Tap K or Z to launch a turret

- Hold K or Z to rotate a turret

- Hold L or X to duck, becoming invulnerable

- Press R to restart the level
